example:
() => (
  <Stack>
    <Stack spacing="XXSmall">
      <Heading as="h3" type="title3">
        Small
      </Heading>
      <Stack direction="row">
        <Seat size="small" selected type="default" />
        <Seat size="small" selected type="legroom" />
      </Stack>
    </Stack>
    <Stack spacing="XXSmall">
      <Heading as="h3" type="title3">
        Medium
      </Heading>
      <Stack direction="row">
        <Seat size="medium" selected type="default" />
        <Seat size="medium" selected type="legroom" />
      </Stack>
    </Stack>
  </Stack>
)
